summary: The old man who lives a secluded life in the desert, alone with only his memories and photographs.
cast: Dmitri Milyutenko|Larisa Kadochnikova|Feodosiya Litvinenko|Nina Alisova|Dzhemma Firsova|Ivan Kostyuchenko|Evgeniy Baliev|Yuriy Mazhuga|Yelena Kovalenko|Konstantin Ershov|Nataliya Mishchenko|Vladimir Lemport|Nikolai Silis|Grigoriy Basenko
title: Krynytsya dlya sprahlykh
